title: Why Lions can shock the world with Aaron Schatz (Football 8/13)
description:
Will Brinson breaks down the latest news and notes around the NFL, including Antonio Brown losing his grievance (3:00), Dak Prescott contract rumors (6:00) and more. Then he welcomes on Aaron Schatz of Football Outsiders to discuss why the Lions are the biggest surprise (19:00), why the Bears are primed to regress (26:00), what to expect from the Colts and how HAVOC plays a role in analysis (29:30), if NFL teams are going to try and run the ball (36:00), what Baker Mayfield's second half says about his future performance (39:00) and some fantasy sleepers to take a look at (42:00) plus much more. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
